data.text: Aanei i lala, e hagatau eia i di mmaadua, nia dama daane a David ala ne haanau i dono madagoaa nogo noho i Hebron:
Digaula huogodoo dogoono ne haanau i Hebron i lodo nia ngadau e hidu mo di baahi a David nogo dagi i golo.3.4 2 Samuel 5.4-5; 1 Kings 2.11; 1 Kronikel 29.27
Ana dama daane dogologo ne haanau i golo.
David guu hai ana dama daane dogohiwa labelaa i golo, go Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, mo Eliphelet.
Hagapuni ang gi nia dama daane huogodoo aanei, David guu hai ana dama daane gi ana ahina hege ala e noho i dono baahi. Mee guu hai labelaa dana dama ahina go Tamar.
Deenei di hagatau o nia hagadili o King Solomon mai tamana gaa dau gi tama daane: Solomon, Rehoboam, Abijah, Asa, Jehoshaphat,
Jehoram, Ahaziah, Joash,
Amaziah, Uzziah, Jotham,
Ahaz, Hezekiah, Manasseh,
Amon mo Josiah.
Josiah ana dama daane dogohaa go Johanan, Jehoiakim, Zedekiah, mo Joahaz.
Jehoiakim ana dama daane dogolua go Jehoiachin mo Zedekiah.
Aanei nia hagadili o King Jehoiachin, dela ne lahi ga galabudi go digau o Babylon. Jehoiachin ne hai ana dama daane dogohidu go Shealtiel,
Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama mo Nedabiah.
Pedaiah ne hai ana dama daane dogolua go Zerubbabel mo Shimei. Zerubbabel la go tamana o nia dama daane dogolua go Meshullam mo Hananiah, mo tama ahina e dahi go Shelomith.
Mee ana dama daane dogolima labelaa go Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah, mo Jushab Hesed.
Hananiah guu hai ana dama daane dogolua go Pelatiah mo Jeshaiah. Jeshaiah la go tamana o Rephaiah, dela go tamana o Arnan, tamana o Obadiah, tamana o Shecaniah.
Shecaniah ne hai dana dama daane e dahi go Shemaiah ge dogolima dama daane mmaadua go Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah mo Shaphat.
Neariah guu hai ana dama daane dogodolu go Elioenai, Hizkiah mo Azrikam.
Elioenai guu hai ana dama daane dogohidu go Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah mo Anani.
